data.title: Ramen To Entrance Of Mid Vent Recon Bolt
data.description: This is useful for revealing players inside of Mid Vent, without players in Mid Vent being able to stop themselves from being revealed, unless they shoot the recon bolt or go into Lower Vents. To do this, stand in the corner seen on screen, hug the wall behind you, follow the lineup exactly as seen on screen, and then shoot a single bounce full charge recon bolt.
